quizDescription: Test your pun-tastic humor with these groan-worthy puns and riddles!

questions.question: What do you call a fish with no eyes?
questions.explanation: A fish with no eyes is simply 'Fsh'! It's all about the fin-tastic wordplay.

questions.question: Why did the bicycle fall over?
options: It wanted to take a nap
questions.explanation: The bicycle fell over because 'It was tired' of standing up all day!

questions.question: What do you call cheese that isn't yours?
questions.explanation: Cheese that isn't yours is 'Nacho cheese'! It belongs to someone else.

questions.question: Why did the scarecrow win an award?
options: It was outstanding in its field
questions.answer: It was outstanding in its field
questions.explanation: The scarecrow won an award because 'It was outstanding in its field' at scaring away crows!

questions.question: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
questions.explanation: A bear with no teeth is 'A gummy bear.' It can't chew much!
